amendment.description: Amendment requires stainless steel flatware procured by the Department of Defense to be reprocessed, reused, or produced in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to require stainless steel flatware procured by the Department of Defense to be reprocessed, reused, or produced in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 187 (Roll no. 441).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Brindisi.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 187 (Roll no. 441).
